revised_title: Vibrational Studies and Model for Halogen-Bridged Linear-Chain Mixed-Valence Complexes
tldr: The authors conducted Fourier transform infrared and resonance Raman spectroscopy on halogen-bridged linear-chain mixed-valence complexes. They observed chlorine isotopic splitting in the stretching modes of the linear units in the chains and developed a simple vibrational model that reproduces the observed splitting patterns. The study provides insights into the relationship between the stretching force constants and the electronic properties of these complexes.
